about_the_game:
The main character has a chance encounter with his high school crush, Margaret, a newly widowed and deeply religious woman. Despite the beliefs instilled in her, Margarets longs to learn about the unexplored regions of her body and soul.

In this short but gripping story, you’ll help her discover a new world without shattering her principles. The narrative is primarily composed of dialog, avoiding long, boring descriptions of places and actions. Get your right (or left) hand ready and prepare yourself for an experience you’ll never forget!
